analysis.description:
Play0x_LottoBall.sendFunds (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#833-842) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#836-842)

Reentrancy in Play0x_LottoBall.settleBet (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#500-602):
	External calls:
	- (totalAmount,totalTokenAmount,totalJackpotWin) = runRotateTime(combinationParameter,_entropy,keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(uint256(_entropy),blockhash(uint256)(combinationParameter[uint8(SettleParam.LuckySeed)])))) (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#536-539)

	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).transfer(bet.gambler,totalTokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#567-572)
	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).balanceOf(address(this)) > 0 (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#575-582)
	- ERC20(ERC20ContractAddres).transfer(bet.gambler,totalAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#576-577)

	- (one ^ 0xF) == 0 && (two ^ 0xF) == 0 && (three ^ 0xF) == 0 && (four ^ 0xF) == 0

	- (one ^ 0xF) == 0 && (two ^ 0xF) == 0 && (three ^ 0xF) == 0 && (four ^ 0xF) == 0
	- (one ^ 0xF) == 0 && (two ^ 0xF) == 0 && (three ^ 0xF) == 0 && (four ^ 0xF) == 0

Play0x_LottoBall.settleBet (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#500-602) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- totalAmount != 0 (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#561-565)
	- totalAmount != 0 (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#575-582)

	- totalJackpotWin > 0 && combinationParameter[uint8(SettleParam.CurrencyType)] == 1 (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#544-552)

Play0x_LottoBall.runRotateTime (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#602-662) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- isGetJackpot == true && combinationParameter[uint8(SettleParam.CurrencyType)] == 0 (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#654-662)

	- isGetJackpot == false (/unique_chucks/20/0x24a97310a50d8536fedf5cd01773be590dc62451.sol#649-654)
